casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

May 1, 2006

[Cite as 05/01/2006 Case Announcements, 2006-Ohio-2101.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2006-0237. State ex rel. Strzala v. Gallagher.

In Prohibition. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of prohibition. Upon consideration of relator’s motion for leave of court to file declaratory judgment,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion is denied.
